price: Na ambao wanazichunga amana zao na ahadi zao,
footnotes: Na hao wenye kuzihifadhi amana za sharia na amana za waja wa Mwenyezi Mungu, na walio lazimika nayo kwa Mwenyezi Mungu na kwa watu bila ya kukhuni wala kupunja,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
